com.konakart.app
Class PromotionOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.konakart.app.PromotionOptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
PromotionOptionsIf
public class PromotionOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements PromotionOptionsIf

The PromotionOptions is passed to the getPromotionsPerProducts() and getPromotionsPerCoupon API calls to configure the behavior of the calls.

PRM_RULE_CUMULATIVE

public static final int PRM_RULE_CUMULATIVE
Constant for rule to apply for more than one promotion. Only applied when discount is an amount and not a percentage.
